alert.note: Alert for Northern Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 6:21PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Clackamas and southeastern Marion Counties through 700 PM PDT... At 621 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Breitenbush Springs, or 9 miles northeast of Detroit, moving northwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Breitenbush Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
